testcase.classname: Check if the uber website is functionally working
testcase.name: Check if the user is able to view the uber website
testcase.system-out: Given The user is in the uber landing page..................................passed Then verify the page title and url..........................................passed

testcase.classname: Check if the uber website is functionally working
testcase.name: Check if the user is able to search for any cabs
testcase.system-out: Given The user is in the uber landing page..................................passed When The user enters source and destination location........................passed Then click on search prices.................................................passed Then check if the cab details are displayed.................................passed

testcase.classname: Check if the uber website is functionally working
testcase.name: Check if the user is able to login to the app
testcase.system-out: Given The user is in the uber landing page..................................passed When The user on login link.................................................passed Then The user should be taken to the login section..........................passed

testcase.classname: Check if the uber website is functionally working
testcase.name: Check if the user is able to complete payment with VISA card
testcase.system-out: Given The user is in the uber landing page..................................passed When The user completes the ride............................................passed Then Check if the user is able to complete the payment with VISA............passed

testcase.classname: Check if the uber website is functionally working
testcase.name: Check if the user is able to update the language
testcase.system-out: Given The user is in the uber landing page..................................passed When The user click on "EN" language switch option..........................passed Then The user should be able to select language.............................passed
